#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>

/*
* 	print first max then min second max then second min and so on
*	written by Hariom Singh
*
*/
using namespace std;

int main(){
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		int i,a[n+1];
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		cin>>a[i];
		sort(a,a+n);
		int l=n-1;
		i=0;
		while(l>i)
		{
			cout<<a[l]<<" "<<a[i]<<" ";
			l--;i++;
		}
		if(n%2!=0)
		cout<<a[i]<<endl;
		else
		cout<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
